Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.PlayerToGameMessages.DataMessages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildData
    contains the details regarding the build action requested
    CardChoice
    contains the card/s the player wants to use
    DataMessage
    class extended by the all the message classes whose objects are sent from the player to the server through the socket
    EndChoice
    end of turn request sent by the player
    MoveData
    contains the details regarding the move action requested
    PlayerInfo
    contains the player's information requested at the start of the game
    QuitChoice
    quit request sent by the player
    StartingPositionChoice
    contains the data about the starting position selected by the user
